procedure.title: Procedure Document
procedure.content: This is a sample procedure document.

section.title: Introduction
section.content: This document outlines the steps required to perform a specific procedure.

section.title: Preliminary Requirements
section.content: The following requirements must be met before starting the procedure:

itemizedList.item: Remove the front wheel, refer to: Front Wheel Removal Procedure
Remove the front brakes, refer to: Front Brakes Removal Procedure

section.title: Front Wheel Removal Procedure
section.content: To remove the front wheel, follow these steps:

orderedList.item: Loosen the nuts that hold the wheel in place.
Raise the bike using a lift or jack.
Remove the nuts and washers from the wheel hub.
Carefully pull the wheel straight off the hub.

section.title: Front Brakes Removal Procedure
section.content: To remove the front brakes, follow these steps:

orderedList.item: Loosen the caliper bolts that hold the brake in place.
Remove the caliper bolts and slide the caliper off the rotor.
Remove the pads from the caliper.

section.title: Main Procedure
section.content: The main procedure consists of the following steps:

itemizedList.item: Remove the front wheel, refer to: Front Wheel Removal Procedure
Remove the front brakes, refer to: Front Brakes Removal Procedure

orderedList.item: Remove the fork: Refer to: Fork Removal Procedure
Change the bike axis: Refer to: Bike Axis Change Procedure
Install the new fork: Refer to: New Fork Installation Procedure
Install the front brakes: Refer to: Front Brakes Installation Procedure
Install the front wheel: Refer to: Front Wheel Installation Procedure

section.title: Fork Removal Procedure
section.content: To remove the fork, follow these steps:

orderedList.item: Loosen the nuts that hold the fork in place.
Raise the bike using a lift or jack.
Remove the nuts and washers from the fork.
Carefully pull the fork straight off the bike.

section.title: Bike Axis Change Procedure
section.content: To change the bike axis, follow these steps:

orderedList.item: Loosen the bolts that hold the axis in place.
Remove the bolts and slide the axis out of the bike.
Install the new axis and tighten the bolts.

section.title: New Fork Installation Procedure
section.content: To install the new fork, follow these steps:

orderedList.item: Place the new fork onto the bike.
Tighten the nuts and washers to secure the fork in place.
Lower the bike using a lift or jack.

section.title: Front Brakes Installation Procedure
section.content: To install the front brakes, follow these steps:

orderedList.item: Slide the caliper back over the rotor.
Replace the pads in the caliper.
Tighten the caliper bolts to secure the brake in place.

section.title: Front Wheel Installation Procedure
section.content: To install the front wheel, follow these steps:

orderedList.item: Place the wheel back onto the hub.
Replace the nuts and washers to secure the wheel in place.
Lower the bike using a lift or jack.
Test the fork installation: Refer to: Fork Installation Test Procedure
Front brakes test: Refer to: Front Brakes Test Procedure

section.title: Fork Installation Test Procedure
section.content: To test the fork installation, follow these steps:

orderedList.item: Check that the fork is properly secured in place.
Test the bike's suspension.

section.title: Front Brakes Test Procedure
section.content: To test the front brakes, follow these steps:

orderedList.item: Check that the brake pads are properly aligned with the rotor.
Test the brakes by applying gentle pressure to the lever.

section.title: Close Requirements
section.content: The following requirements must be met after completing the procedure:

procedure.note: Note: This document is a sample and should not be used in actual procedures without proper review and validation.
